entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue with error CS0114 and CS0109 #63821
  • ShadowCopyAnalyzerAssemblyLoader should deduplicate assemblies #63820
  • [LSP] XML Doc Comment completions don't set the cursor properly in Razor #63811
    17.4
  • [Regression] "Rename symbol's file" option gets forgotten #63810
    17.4

Closed

  • Define meaning of BuckStopsHereBinder.AssociatedSyntaxTree in EE scenarios #62332
    17.4
  • Support file-local types in EE #62334
    17.4
  • Expose service to determine what change are allowed, without going back to a Workspace #63457
  • using statement declaration within switch ending in goto results in "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #63570
    17.4
  • Flaky Analyzers on latest .NET preview #63225
    17.4
  • Generator 'CodeBehindGenerator' failed to generate source: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Collections.Immutable, Version=6.0.0.0' #63813
  • IDE: Suppress warning is not available for multiple warning types #63793

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix rename file option so it only updates with user changes #63827
    Area-IDE
  • Change extension of metadata file produced by EnC logging from md to meta #63826
    Area-Interactive
  • Use the term 'parameter' instead of 'formal parameter' #63825
    Area-Compilers
  • Propagate In/Out attributes on local functions #63824
    Area-Compilers
  • Move 'Todo Comments' to EA pattern #63817
    Area-IDE
  • Send back caret info if the client supports completion snippets #63812
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix option storage for selecting old/new rename experience #63823
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make ISupportedChangesService api public #63752
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63822
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge with main #63816
    Area-IDE
  • Store the collapsed state of the UI for inline rename #63788
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix API break with TypeScript in EA layer. #63819
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Account for using declarations in nested switch statement gotos #63655
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63814
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update dev17.4 publishing config #63815
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Refactoring constructor initializers to use primary constructors #63648
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Fix race condition in analyzer driver for computing nodes to analyze … #63665
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63828
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Some improvements to Workspace.CanApplyChanges #63701
    Area-IDE
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Better error recovery when 'readonly' is used as a parameter modifier #63777
    Area-Compilers
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Build only test projects and split out building TFMs into separate queues #63677
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Convert To Record Refactoring/Code Fix initial offering #63654
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enforce SetsRequiredMembers nullability on implicit chained constructors #63790
    Area-Compilers
  • [BULK] DocuTune - Fix build validation issues: docs-link-absolute #63791
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move todo-comments onto LSP. #63784
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • When shrinking breakpoints down to less lines, stick to the end of the range #63731
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll in Solution support for Enable nullable refactoring #61879
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Make scripting work in single-file deployments #57910
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
